Text: You deserve the pink skull. Thanks.
Ha ha, I have the pink skull already ...
Can I say you earned it. hahah!

Nope, I born with it. :)

Pink skull is not a reward of being good uploader. Pink skull means TRUSTED uploader. That skull is meant for the downloaders to ensure that the stuff being downloaded is from a verified source - hence less chance of having crap after downloading.

I've earned only your support, thats all. Thanx.

Hi _F1_!
Thanks for the amazing library. Can you add some books on Public-Private Partnerships? Follow some of the books required. Thank you in advance 
The Promise and Perils of Infrastructure Privatization: The Macquarie Model
By: Solomon, Lewis D.
Published by: Palgrave Macmillan Ltd. 

Public-Private Partnerships: Managing Risks and OpportunitiesBy: Akintoye, Akintola(ed.) ; Beck, Matthias(ed.) ; Hardcastle, Cliff(ed.) 
Published By: John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.

Policy, Management and Finance for Public-Private Partnerships By: Akintoye, Akintola(ed.) ; Beck, Matthias(ed.) ; Hardcastle, Cliff(ed.) 
Published By: John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
